page.title: 04F.B. Fields
page.content: These{recreational grounds}were set up on the site of a flower farm in 1928. The project was financed by{Jesse {Boot,}of Boots chemist, a resident of the island who formed a trust in memory of his wife{Florence Boot (F.B.). The States of Jersey took over the Fields when the trust ran out of funds twenty years ago. There are{three pavillions}on the site. In winter there are{eight {soccer pitches, one hockey pitch}and {two netball courts;}in summer{one {grass wicket, two artificial ones, an {athletics track, a croquet lawn}and {two volleyball courts.}A new synthectic{athletic track}is to be constructed this year.
